article.title: GE to Support Ground-Based Operation Surveillance Systems
article.author: George Seffers

tags.tag: Marine Corps Ground Based Operation Surveillance Systems

article.text: GE Aviation Systems Limited Liability Corporation, Grand Rapids, Michigan, is being awarded an $8,956,586 firm-fixed-price, indefinite delivery/indefinite quantity contract for initial reference units, and associated transit cases, lab asset, test, teardown, evaluation and standard repair, major repairs, and engineering support in support of U.S. Marine Corps Ground Based Operation Surveillance Systems.Â Naval Surface Warfare Center, Crane, Indiana, is the contracting activity.
